View Javadoc
1   package test.external;
2   
3   import java.time.LocalDate;
4   
5   import com.github.mygreen.supercsv.annotation.CsvBean;
6   import com.github.mygreen.supercsv.annotation.CsvColumn;
7   import com.github.mygreen.supercsv.annotation.constraint.CsvLengthMax;
8   import com.github.mygreen.supercsv.annotation.constraint.CsvRequire;
9   import com.github.mygreen.supercsv.annotation.format.CsvDateTimeFormat;
10  import com.github.mygreen.supercsv.annotation.format.CsvEnumFormat;
11  import com.github.mygreen.supercsv.annotation.format.CsvFormat;
12  
13  import test.external.PostalCode.PostalCodeFormatter;
14  
15  /**
16   * サンプルのCSV。
17   * <p>外部パッケージの確認用。
18   *
19   * @author T.TSUCHIE
20   *
21   */
22  @CsvBean(header = true)
23  public class ExternalCsv {
24      
25      public static enum Role {
26          Admin, Developer, Repoter
27      }
28      
29      @CsvRequire
30      @CsvColumn(number = 1, label = "ID")
31      private Long id;
32      
33      @CsvRequire
34      @CsvLengthMax(20)
35      @CsvColumn(number = 2, label = "名前")
36      private String name;
37      
38      @CsvColumn(number=3, label="入社日付")
39      @CsvDateTimeFormat(pattern="uuuu/MM/dd")   // 日時の書式を指定する
40      private LocalDate joinedDate;
41      
42      @CsvColumn(number=4, label="ロール")
43      @CsvEnumFormat(ignoreCase = true)
44      private Role role;
45      
46      @CsvColumn(number=5, label="郵便番号")
47      @CsvFormat(formatter=PostalCodeFormatter.class, message="[{rowNumber}行, {columnNumber}列] : 項目「{label}」の値（${empty(printer) ? validatedValue : printer.print(validatedValue)}）は、郵便番号の形式として不正です。")
48      private PostalCode postalCode;
49      
50      public Long getId() {
51          return id;
52      }
53      
54      public void setId(Long id) {
55          this.id = id;
56      }
57      
58      public String getName() {
59          return name;
60      }
61      
62      public void setName(String name) {
63          this.name = name;
64      }
65      
66      public LocalDate getJoinedDate() {
67          return joinedDate;
68      }
69      
70      public void setJoinedDate(LocalDate joinedDate) {
71          this.joinedDate = joinedDate;
72      }
73      
74      public Role getRole() {
75          return role;
76      }
77      
78      public void setRole(Role role) {
79          this.role = role;
80      }
81  
82      public PostalCode getPostalCode() {
83          return postalCode;
84      }
85      
86      public void setPostalCode(PostalCode postalCode) {
87          this.postalCode = postalCode;
88      }
89      
90  }
